pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 11, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Lac-MÃ©gantic, Quebec

9 a.m.     The Prime Minister and the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard, will make an announcement. A joint media availability will follow.

 In front of the train station
 5490, rue de la Gare

 Notes to media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m. at the La Corderie room inside the station.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on regional development.

 Train station
 5490, rue de la Gare

 Note to media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

Oromocto, New Brunswick

4:45 p.m.  The Prime Minister and the Premier of New Brunswick, Brian Gallant, will visit an incident command post.

Town of Oromocto Fire Department
4 Doyle Drive

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:15 p.m. at the back entrance of the town building

5:30 p.m.  The Prime Minister and the Premier of New Brunswick will tour communities along the St. John River affected by flooding.

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
